text: Ne abatonga inyuma baliboola mbu “ Nimutsia okhubukula omwandu kweliyie (ghanima) mukhuleshe khutsie ninanyu, benyanga okhukalukhania amakhuwa ka Nyasaye, boola shimulakhulondokhwo tawe, endio nilwa Nyasaye yamala okhuboola imbeli, kho balaboola mbu : “enywe mulineshikhalikhali ninafu,” halali shibali bamanya tawe halali hatiti
